input.content: The class name and structure for each button is {Reply ("reply"), Retweet ("retweet"), Like ("like"), More ("more"): {Share via DM ("share"), Copy link to Tweet ("copy"), Embed Tweet ("embed"), Mute ("menu-user"), Block ("block-user"), Report ("report")}}

Observation:
For the user @truman, click on the "Mute" button.
Boyd @truman...
Sabrina @adipiscing...
Action:

```
agent.click_xpath("//div[@data-result='0']//span[@class='more']")  # Because share, copy, embed, menu-user, block-user, and report is in the sublist of 'more'
agent.click_xpath("//div[@data-result='0']//li[@class='menu-user']")  # Click 'menu-user' to mute the target user
```
